constituent: home town, cocoon, silver, city walls
koohiiStory1: Your hometown is where you broke out of your cocoon (born), and where you left when your hair was silver (died), your whole life was spent inside the city walls.
koohiiStory2: Your home town is where you earned enough silver to enable you to break out of your giant cocoon (leave home) and explore outside the city walls.
readingExamples: 郷里 (きょうり), 郷土 (きょうど), 異郷 (いきょう)
words:
郷愁(きょうしゅう): nostalgia, homesickness
郷里(きょうり): birth-place, home town
故郷(こきょう): home town, birthplace, old or historic village
